component.type: Refactor and map to a NoSQL
component.description: Refactoring the data of Leeds and Brno. Using MongoDB.
component.problems: The procedure of launching Mongo through terminal is complicated. As it required to run command first then followed by install Mongo Shell and Mongodb Compass.
component.solutions: Going step by step and I have to make sure codes run correctly.

file.name: cities_database.json
file.purpose: In put Twin Cities data both Leeds and Brno then recode them.

individual_metafile.security_discussion: The four attributes I will be focusing on are Confidentiality, Integrity, Availability and Utility
individual_metafile.individual_comment: I found out some parts are challenging to me as I don't have much experience in-depth details. It took me a while to understand how it will works.
